com.guitariffic.view.support
Class ChordChartTransferHandler

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.TransferHandler
      com.guitariffic.view.support.ChordChartTransferHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ChordChartTransferHandler
extends javax.swing.TransferHandler

Transfer handler for the table drag and drop functionality. This is to transfer data within the chord chart area. Note that canImport() returns true which means that you can move chords between cells in the chord chart area.

Author:
ryszardkilarski
